testsuite.name: com.example.demo.service.AnimeServiceTest

testcase.name: POST - It saves the anime and returns it if successful
DELETE - It deletes an anime if it exists
GET - It tries to find an anime by id and returns it if successful
PUT - It updates an anime if it exists
GET - It tries to find an anime by name and returns a list if successful
GET - It returns a list of anime inside a page object if successful
GET - It tries to find an anime by name and returns an empty list if unsuccessful
GET - It tries to find an anime by id and returns it if successful. Throws BadRequestException otherwise
GET - It returns a list of all anime if successful
